page.title: 17Brownie Camp.
page.content: When we arrived at All Stretton Hall we dumped our kit against the wall.There was a stage so we made some plays. On the first night I didn't get to sleep till 4.30 a.m. I was crawling round in my sleeping bag with Anna Dudley and we were throwing teddies at each other.In the morning when I woke up everybody else was still asleep.We had breakfast at 6 o'clock. After we had had breakfast we went into town and did some shopping.Then we went to the swimming baths.I did my Brownie Swimmer's Badge.At the swimming baths there was a diving board which I jumped and dived off. When we went to bed again I put bubble gum in my mouth and Jane and I were blowing bubbles in bed.I blew a big one and it popped on my face.I had more sleep than the night before.
